        Sunrise is a subsidiary of Bond Group of Companies situated in Ibadan, Oyo State with business interest in supermarket, pharmacy, eatery and arcade.

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "After Sales Engineer",
  "description": "Beebeejump is a Renewable Energy company specialized in providing efficient and affordable electricity at different scale. We meet the electricity needs of household and all strata of businesses through our Pay as you go structure, improving quality of life and providing access to 24/7 electricity.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: After Sales Engineer

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Responsible for product repair, testing and maintenance to ensure functionality.
	Able to read and interpret electronic circuit diagrams and analyze faults based on these diagrams.
	Proficient in using soldering iron and other repair tools to solder and replace motherboard hardware.
	Communicate with customers and technical team to address aftersales technical issues.
	Maintain detailed service logs and reports.
	Coordinate with the engineering team for system checks and upgrades.
	Familiar with the Installation of both on-grid and off-grid solar installation


Requirements/Qualifications


	Graduate of Electrical/Electronics Engineering or any course in related field with a minimum of 1 year of practical experience as an Aftersales Engineer in a solar company.
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
	Willing to do on-site/field works.
	Excellent time management, Communication and customer relationship management skill.
	Familiar with electric circuit faults.


Salary

	Responsible for product repair, testing and maintenance to ensure functionality.
	Able to read and interpret electronic circuit diagrams and analyze faults based on these diagrams.

	Communicate with customers and technical team to address aftersales technical issues.
	Maintain detailed service logs and reports.
	Coordinate with the engineering team for system checks and upgrades.
	Familiar with the Installation of both on-grid and off-grid solar installation

	Graduate of Electrical/Electronics Engineering or any course in related field with a minimum of 1 year of practical experience as an Aftersales Engineer in a solar company.
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
	Willing to do on-site/field works.
	Excellent time management, Communication and customer relationship management skill.
	Familiar with electric circuit faults.
